sourcing.instructions: Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online distributor specializing in rare earth elements.
steps: Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online distributor specializing in rare earth elements.
1. Weigh each ingredient using an analytical balance to ensure precision.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient using an analytical balance to ensure precision.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally; do not open the furnace door during cooling.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally; do not open the furnace door during cooling.

steps: 1. Remove the solidified sample from the crucible carefully, taking care to avoid any breakage.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solidified sample from the crucible carefully, taking care to avoid any breakage.
